metatags.apple-mobile-web-app-title: FactCheck.org - A Project of The Annenberg Public Policy Center
metatags.og:description: We’ve received a number of queries about a photograph purporting to show President Obama at Arlington National Cemetery on Veterans Day, listening to the national anthem without his hand over his heart. Anyone who saw news coverage of Obama on Veterans Day might have smelled a rat right away: He didn’t wear a red tie that day, as he does in the picture, but a blue one, and he wore a winter coat over his suit.
metatags.twitter:creator: @factcheckdotorg
metatags.author: Jess Henig
metatags.og:title: What's Wrong With This Picture? - FactCheck.org

metatags.og:description: It used to be simpler. During World War II or when we landed a man on the moon, we swelled with national pride. Now, a “patriotism gap” separates us.
